page.title: 18BLO'NORTON LISTED BUILDINGS.
page.content: 37TH LIST of BUILDINGS OF INTEREST. {CHURCH of ST. ANDREW.}13th,14th Century, restored 1879. GRADE 2* {MANOR FARMHOUSE.}Early 18th. GRADE 2 {CHURCH FARMHOUSE(AND BARNS).}15th,16th and 20th Century. GRADE 2* {2 COTTAGES}330m ENE of CHURCH F'SE. Late 17th Century. GRADE 2 {HAMPTON HOUSE}(COTTAGE). Early 18th Century, rebuilt 1983. GRADE 2 {BLO'NORTON HOUSE.}(Farmhouse).1700, 18th Century and later. GRADE 2 {WHITEHOUSE FARMHOUSE.}Late 17th, 18th and some 20th Century. GRADE 2 {ARCH.}8m NE of the HALL.1564 GRADE 2 {BLO'NORTON HALL.}Elizabethan.Divided into two tenented dwellings. Onetime home of Prince Frederick Duleep Singh, 2nd Son of the Maharaja of Lahore. Mid 16th Century, enlarged 1585, repairs and alterations in 17th, 18th, 19th & 20th Centuries. GRADE 2*
